fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Launch Application
2. Controls > TextField > Soft Input Focus
3. Click on close button

Actual Result:
Application Crashes

Expected Result:
Close the test
fields.summary: Android: TextField: Rhino only, clicking on the close button causes the application to crash

Device: LG Slate 3.1/Droid3 2.3.4
